text: Chisimu Asilamu ŵachilume ni ŵachikongwe, ŵakulupilila ŵachilume ni ŵachikongwe, ŵakunda malamusi ŵachilume ni ŵachikongwe, ŵakuŵecheta yakuona ŵachilume ni ŵachikongwe, ŵakupilila ŵachilume ni ŵachikongwe, ŵakuteteŵala (pameso pa Allah) ŵachilume ni ŵachikongwe, ŵakutola sadaka ŵachilume ni ŵachikongwe, ŵakutaŵa (swaumu) ŵachilume ni ŵachikongwe, ŵagosa utukani wao ŵachilume ni ŵachikongwe, ŵakunkumbuchila Allah kwejinji ŵachilume ni ŵachikongwe, Allah ŵalinganyichisye ŵanganyao chikululuko kwisa soni malipilo gamakulungwa nnope
